description: Prospective science teachers learn strategies for the practical application of learning theory to secondary school science classrooms. Topics include: the national science standards movement and No Child Left Behind: inquiry learning in the science classroom; lesson planning; teaching in the classroom and in the laboratory; technology: managing a science laboratory: and continuing professional development. Required field experience component. Prerequisite: Education 330. Offered annually in the Spring Semester.
name: Tchg of Science
prerequisites: Education 330. Offered annually in the Spring Semester.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Education 330. Offered annually in the Spring Semester.

title: Teaching of Science, 5-12
